Sarah Chan, Business Administration at NUSLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 10 Jun 2019Hi Yixuan,Check out the analysis I did for a similar question here: https://seedly.sg/questions/hi-all-i-am-using-dbs-live-fresh-card-which-fits-my-spending-patterns-but-currently-alot-of-spending-remain-uncaptured-as-eligible-cashback-spend-was-thinking-which-other-cc-miles-i-should-get-to-complement-itIn short:1) Did you know about the monthly caps on the various types of expenditure?2) Did you hit the min. spending?3) Did you spend on the exceptions instead?1 comment1

Huang Yixuan10 Jun 2019I use about 1k a month and mostly on online and visa paywave, on alternate months I get full $40 cashback (paywave and online) but on other months it’s just a few cents. It’s confirm inaccurate...
